sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getProducts } from '../../store/ProductsSlice' import style from './Products.module.scss' export default function Products() { const {products} = useSelector(state=>state.products) let [modalData, setModalData] = useState(""); const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProducts()) }, [dispatch]) let getData = (state) => { setModalData(state); }; return ( <>

Products

Trendy

{products.map((item)=> <>
(e.currentTarget.src = item.images[1])} onMouseOut={e => (e.currentTarget.src = item.images[0])}/>

{item.title}

getData(item)} data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#staticBackdrop">

{modalData.title}

)}
) }
